turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule a doctor's appointment. Can you help?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, I can. To get started, could you please provide your name and date of birth?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: It's John Smith, and my date of birth is 05/10/1980. I need to see a general practitioner.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, John Smith, born May 10, 1980. Searching for available GP appointments... Do you have any preferred days or times?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Actually, I need to be seen ASAP. Preferably tomorrow, and if possible, in the morning. I'm not feeling too well, and I don't want to wait.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am sorry, but I cannot provide a time earlier than tomorrow afternoon. Would you like me to look for afternoon appointments? Also, what is the reason for your visit?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, that's frustrating. Why is it so hard to get a morning appointment? Fine, afternoon works, but what's the shortest wait time for a new patient like me? And will they even be able to fully assess me in one afternoon appointment?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: The shortest wait time would be on Tuesday afternoon, 2:30 PM. As a new patient, the doctor will allocate extra time to assess your health and provide appropriate treatment. If further tests are needed, they will be scheduled accordingly. Would you like me to book this appointment for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, please. Book it for Tuesday at 2:30 PM. Can you send me a confirmation?
